Hello there!

 

Zardus's ideas are pretty much on the spot - probably the best way to play
the game these days is via Snowstorm's conversion.  However, if you'd prefer
the original file, just e-mail me directly (you can use tom@...
<mailto:tom@...>  or whatever) and I'd be happy to send you a copy of
the zip file.

 

Also, I wanted to apologize to everyone for fsgames.com going down - our
hosting company managed to muck things up considerably in the last few
months, so we finally just shut it down until we could get it fixed.

 

--Tom

 

-----Original Message-----
From: the_podger [mailto:the_podger@...] 
Sent: Saturday, April 26, 2003 7:54 AM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] Where to get Gladiator

 

Hey - I bought Gladiator years and years ago, spent WAY too much time 
playing it, aquired many fond memories, and now I cannot find the 
disk. . . Where can I find it?  FSgames.com seems to be defunct.
